User Agreement

1.Acceptance of the Agreement

Through the visit and / or using this application/Site, you agree to accept all terms and conditions the agreement. Handpet Software Technology Development Studio (hereinafter referred to as the Handpet Studio) as the operator of Vlife wallpaper (Mobile Application) provides services for you in terms of this agreement. If you are unwilling to accept all the terms and conditions of this agreement, please do not access or use this website/Mobile Application.

2.Change and Amendment of the Agreement

Handpet Studio has the right to modify this agreement at any time, and once the terms of the agreement changes, Handpet Studio will point out the modified content on page; if the user disagrees with the modifications of this agreement, you can give up the use of or access to the web / Mobile Application or cancel the services; if the user chooses to access or use this website / Mobile Applications after the agreement is changed, users are deemed to have accepted the amendment of this agreement.

3.Service

(1)Vlife wallpaper is an application to provide the users the upload space and technology of mobile dynamic wallpaper, it doesn’t upload content directly.

(2)Handpet Studio is not responsible for this Mobile Application, it doesn’t promise the services will meet the requirements of users, neither the break-off the services. It also does not guaranty the timeliness, safety and accuracy of the services.

4.Behavior of Users

4.1Users should comply with the following laws and regulations Users agree to comply with , , , , , and other related regulations. Handpet Studio has rights to terminate providing service to an user at any time if Handpet Studio rationally thinks the behavior of the user breaks the laws or regulations. Handpet Studio welcomes any user to report any uploaded content which is illegal or infringe the third party’s rights. Handpet Studio will unconditionally delete the content once the above circumstance happens.

4.2Users are forbidden to have the following behaviors:

(1)Upload, post, email or send any content in violation of laws, administrative regulations or other repugnant content including but not limited to information, data, text, software, music, photos, graphics, information or other information (hereinafter referred to as “content”).

(2)Harm minors in any way.

(3)Impersonate any person or institution, or tell a lie or make people mistakenly believe that related to any person or institution.

(4)Forge headers or otherwise manipulate identifying documents to make people mistakenly think that the content is transmitted by Handpet Studio.

(5)Upload, post, email or otherwise transmit any content that will infringe any patent, trademark, copyright, trade secret or other proprietary rights of others.

(6)Upload, post, email or otherwise transmit any advertise, promotional materials, junk mail and so on, except for special area for the aforementioned purposes.

(7)Upload, post, email or otherwise transmit any software viruses or any other computer code, files and program data that will interfere, destroy or limit the functions of any computer software, hardware or telecommunication equipment.

(8)Interfere with or disrupt the Mobile Application or the server and network connected with the Mobile Application, or does not comply with the provisions of the use of this website/ Mobile Application.

(9)Intentionally or unintentionally break the relevant laws or regulations.

4.3Users take full responsibility for the content uploaded, posted, emailed or sent through the Mobile Application. For the content transmitted through the Mobile Application, Handpet Studio does not guaranty the legality, validity, accuracy, completeness or quality. The user may be exposed to an unpleasant, inappropriate or offensive content in the use of the Mobile Application. In any case, Handpet Studio shall not take any responsibility for any content, including but not limited to any content in any error or mistake and derived loss or damage. Handpet Studio has the right (but not the obligation) to refuse or remove any content provided via the Mobile Application. The users bear the risk for using the above content. Handpet Studio has rights under the following conditions, save or disclose the content:

(1)As stipulated in regulations;

(2)As stipulated in this agreement;

(3)A claim of rights by the infringed third party;

(4)To protect the legal rights, property or human safety of Handpet Studio, the users and the public;

(5)Other circumstances that Handpet Studio thinks necessary.

4.4Storage and Restrictions of Users’ Information Handpet Studio does not take responsibilities for deletion or failure to store users’ information. Handpet Studio has the right to judge whether the user’s behavior in accordance with this agreement, and if Handpet Studio judges the use violates this agreement, Handpet Studio has right to terminate the service of the Mobile Application to this user.

5.User Privacy Statement

When a user registers Handpet Studio's service, the user is required to provide personal information. The user needs to protect the security of account name, password, and do not let others know the account and password. The objectives of collecting personal information is intended to provide personalized services as much as possible for the user and to provide a convenient way for advertisers to reach the user, and send relevant content and advertisement. During this process, advertisers will never come into contact with the user's personal information. Handpet Studio will never, without legal authorization from user, open, edit or disclose their personal information and non-public information, unless one of the following conditions happens:

" (1)In terms of the laws or regulations, or legal procedure of Handpet Studio; (2)To protect the interest of users or pubic when emergency arises; (3)To protect trademark, patent, copyright and other legitimate rights. Handpet Studio has rights to use the personal information of users under the following conditions (including but not limited to): (1)Handpet Studio will describe its services to future partners, advertisers and other third party for legitimate purpose through revealing statistic data of overall users. (2)Handpet Studio will send users information about its various products and service or the information which Handpet Studio thinks users will be interested in. If the user does not want to receive this email or mobile information, he/she only needs to inform Handpet Studio when he/she provides personal information. In addition, Handpet Studio will strain every nerve to protect user information, but Handpet Studio is not sure or guaranty the security of any personal information, the user must bear his/her own risk. 6. Uploaded or Posted Content by Users (1)Users’ uploaded content refers to the mobile wallpaper, mobile dynamic wallpaper, images, dynamic images or any other form of content including text, pictures uploaded or posted through this website / Mobile Application by users. (2)Users must ensure that he/she has the ownership of the content uploaded through Vlife, and guaranty the upload behavior will not infringe any third party’s right. human rights violations. Vlife wallpaper only offers users upload space services and provide searching service to users, Vlife will not edit and modify the content in any form, and it does not permanent storage, control, edit or modify the third party’s content or the form of presentation. Any mobile wallpaper, mobile dynamic wallpaper, images, dynamic images uploaded or posted through Vlife wallpaper, either in public or in private, is responsible by the content provider. Vlife wallpaper itself has no ability to censor the uploaded content of the content provider, so it cannot guaranty the accuracy, the validity and applicability of the content. (3)Unless Handpet Studio receives instructions to the contrary, Handpet Studio will deem the user who uploads or the release the contents as the owner of the copyright. Users uploading or publishing content on Vlife is regarded as granting Handpet Studio the permanent revocable and transferable non-exclusive using right free of charge, Handpet Studio has the right to display, distribute and promote the content, have the right to make any the copy of any form, make modification, publish, or distribute or authorize the third party to do so. (4)Users take full responsibilities if his/her uploading leads to any claim or derivative loss or damage to the third party. 7. Intellectual Property and other Rights of Handpet Studio (1)Handpet Studio is the exclusive owner of the copyright, patent, trademark, commercial secret and other rights related to Vlife’s services. Except the Users’ copyright of the content, the copyright of overall content of this Mobile Application belongs to Handpet Studio. (2)The wallpaper and other content transmitted through this Mobile Application is protected by the Copyright Law, Trademark Law, Patent Law and other related laws; the content providers is responsible for the uploaded content, the other user cannot modify, lease, distribute or make derivatives of the content without the authorization of Handpet Studio. (3)User has right to non-exclusively use the software of this Mobile Application, but he/she cannot make copy, modify, sell or make derivatives or permit the third party. (4)All design drawings and other drawings, product and service names of the Mobile Application are Handpet Studio’s trademark, logo. No person shall use, copy or use it for other purposes. (5)Handpet Studio has full intellectual property rights for its proprietary content, original content and other authorized content. Without consent of Handpet Studio, any company or individual shall not reproduce, disseminate or conduct other behavior to infringe Handpet Studio’s intellectual property rights. Otherwise, he/she will assume the legal responsibility. 8. Disclaimer (1)Handpet Studio has right but not the obligation to improve or modify any omission or error of any part of the Mobile Application. (2)Handpet Studio has right but not the obligation to improve or modify any omission or error of any part of the Mobile Application. (3)Handpet Studio shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential or punitive damages for any loss in profits, business reputation, loss of data or other tangible or intangible losses based on the following reasons: a.Use or cannot use this Mobile Application; b.Any product, information or service purchased or acquired though this Mobile Application; c.Unauthorized use or modification of users information; d.Other issues related to this Mobile Application. 9.The Third Party’s Liabilities If the third party makes a claim for the user’s violation of this agreement or infringement of the third party due to uploading content via the Mobile Application, the user agrees to indemnify Handpet Studio and its branch, its related party, agent, partner or employees. 10. Termination of Services Handpet Studio reserves the right at any time, temporarily or permanently terminate the Mobile Application services (or any part thereof), regardless of whether there is a notice. Handpet Studio does not bear any responsibility for terminating the Mobile Application service. Handpet Studio has the right for any reason, to terminate a user’s account, password or, or delete user’s stored or released content without notice, and does not assume any responsibility for this action. 11. Notice The notice by Handpet Studio will be in the form of email, mobile message or page notice. Handpet Studio will publish a notice in the above form for important modification of the agreement or other changes. 12.Governance of law and Jurisdiction "The validity, implementation, interpretation and dispute settlement of this agreement are governed by the laws of PRC, and the dispute about this agreement will be submitted to the jurisdiction of the court where Handpet Studio locates. The conflict between the terms of this agreement and the people's Republic of China current law only leads to invalidity in part, it does not affect the validity of other parts." Notice to Right Holders Handpet Software Technology Development Studio (hereinafter referred to as Handpet Studio) provides content upload, download and dissemination according to the user’s instruction. We attach great importance to the protection of internet copyright and other intellectual property and user rights. If you think the mobile wallpaper images, dynamic graph or other content uploaded, disseminated through Vlife wallpaper infringes your relevant rights and interests, please send us a rights notice, Handpet Studio will take measures to remove the relevant content in accordance with the provisions of relevant laws, you can send notice to the mailbox (support@Vlifepaper.com). Please mail the relevant document to support@Vlifepaper.com. 1.Infringement Notification please provide the following documents: "(1)An Infringement Notification including the following content: the infringed person's name, contact, address, ID card scanning (individuals), the business license (company), the identification certificate of the legal representative (company)." (2)The exact name and network address of the content required to be deleted or disconnected, so that Vlife wallpaper can find and do a preliminary examination of the allegedly infringing content. (3)Materials evidencing that you have right of trade mark, copyright or other legitimate right you are authorized to exercise of the allegedly infringing content. (4)Sign the notification. If you are an entity or an organization established in accordance with laws, please chop your official stamp on it. (5)Be responsible for the authenticity of the rights. If the content of the notice is not true, the person will assume all legal responsibilities arising therefrom. Upon receipt of the notification, we will remove the allegedly infringing content within a reasonable time. Who do not meet the above conditions, we will ask you to provide relevant information, and not to take corresponding measures such as deletion. The users who upload content in Vlife are regarded as agreeing the above statement. Vlife does not assume any liability. Vlife wallpaper will send email notification to the user who upload such works in the receipt of the notice. For users who upload infringing works many times, we will cancel the qualification of the user. Counter Notification The content provider can send a counter notification to Handpet Studio if he/she think his/her content does not infringe other’s right once receiving the forwarded infringement notification, demanding restore the deleted content or restore the disconnected link. The counter notification should include: (1)name, contact, address, ID card scanning (individuals), the business license (company), the identification certificate of the legal representative (company). (2)The exact name and network address of the content required to be restored or reconnected. (3)Materials evidencing that you have right of trade mark, copyright or other legitimate right you are authorized to exercise of the allegedly infringing content. (4)Sign the notification. If you are an entity or an organization established in accordance with laws, please chop your official stamp on it. The content provider should be responsible for the authenticity of the notice. If the notice is not true, the content provider will bear all the legal responsibility. Handpet Studio will immediately resume deleted work, or restore the disconnected works or links to content once receiving the counter notice, while forward the counter notice to the infringed person. Handpet Studio does not bear any legal responsibility for recovering deleted works or content, or restore the disconnected works or links to content. The infringed person shall not inform Handpet Studio again to remove the works or content, or disconnect the works or links to content. " "
